VISUAL ELEMENTS.composition_type: Medium shot (from the chest up of a single woman, next to large text)

human_presence.expressions: Slight smile, inviting or knowing facial expression, direct eye contact with viewer
human_presence.demographics: Appears to be an adult woman, light-to-medium skin tone, long brown hair, possibly in her 30s-40s

main_objects_props: A woman wearing a red/pink floral blouse
Wireless microphone clipped to her blouse
VISUAL ELEMENTS.background_environment: Solid mint green/teal with subtle geometric patterns; no realistic background elements

TEXT ELEMENTS.visible_text: 7 THINGS THAT CHANGE YOUR VAGINA'S pH BALANCE

font_characteristics.style: Heavy bold sans-serif, all-caps (except 'pH'), very modern and easy to read
font_characteristics.emphasis: Key word ('VAGINA’S') is the largest, 'pH BALANCE' and '7 THINGS' are also heavily emphasized, 'THAT CHANGE' slightly smaller
font_characteristics.color: Black letters with thick white outlines for contrast

TEXT ELEMENTS.text_placement: Left two thirds of the thumbnail, stacked in 5 main lines; text fills the background alongside the woman

THEMATIC ELEMENTS.overall_emotional_tone: Informative but attention-grabbing; slightly provocative due to direct reference to 'vagina', balanced by professional, approachable visual style
THEMATIC ELEMENTS.visual_metaphors_or_symbols: The woman's poised, pointing gesture suggests instructiveness or expertise, directing attention toward the text
clickbait_techniques: List structure ('7 things') promises actionable information
Use of a candid human face for trust and personal connection
Large, bold text for immediate clarity
THEMATIC ELEMENTS.brand_elements_present: No strong, explicit brand logos; the style is consistent with health/medical/informative YouTube channels

THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.visual_reinforcement: Thumbnail literally repeats and amplifies the title, using the exact phrase with very clear, bold text. The human expert figure reinforces authority and trust, aligning with the educational focus.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.contrasts_or_mismatches: None apparent. Thumbnail messaging and tone are a direct visual match to the video title—clear, consistent, and intentioned for an audience seeking health information.
